entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
